author: nflaig
content: are we good with https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/546 ? L2s are fine with it although some would prefer just filtering by versioned hashes but there is too much pushback from clients (and even L2s) to drop block index

author: barnabasbusa
content: Could one request specific columns of given blob?

author: barnabasbusa
content: lets say we wanna use this beacon api endpoint for checkpoint sync, and wanna get only 4 columns for non validating nodes instead of all 128 columns

author: nflaig
content: not with this api as it's purpose is to serve blobs for L2s (mostly), but `/eth/v1/debug/beacon/data_column_sidecars/{block_id}` allows to pass `indices` (of columns) so that should do it
